CustomField.formula: 'When Copper (VDSL2 or Voice) is supported MDF Cables depending on the distance towards the MDF are needed.Depending on the DSL-Voice interconnection, interconnection cables are needed.7363 ISAM MX-6 includes two Mandatory licences: IPv6 Security SW package and Subscriber Authentication SW Package.Additional Licenses need to selected for the case Video Services are required.'
CustomField.label: Guidance Cable MX6
